entries.journal_entry_description: Raine Taske is refining his crafting skill. One of the most important items that he will need to have is a Mineral Survey Tool.
entries.journal_entry_title: Sharing the Art of Crafting: Surveying Tools
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: One of the best ways to acquire resources on the ground is to use a survey device. Use the metal that Raine gave you to make a Mineral Survey Device. To use the crafting tool: Double-click on the generic crafting tool in your inventory. Double-click on the schematic that you wish to use. Double-click on the appropriate resources. Only resources that you can use will be available. Once you decide what resources to use, press the 'Assemble' button. Press 'Yes' to confirm that you want to make the item. If you cancel after this point, you lose the resources. You will see how successful the item is. Press 'Next' to continue. Press 'Create Object' to complete the item. Press 'Yes' to confirm. The item will be complete in a few seconds.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: You made the Mineral Survey Device. Talk to Raine and show him what you made. He will reward your hard work.
entries.task01_journal_entry_title: Talk to Raine in Hangar Bay 1
